channel.title: Last One Standing - (0/3 Signups)
channel.description: *This is very similar to the Death Game series, but different.* ___ A situation will arise, and will continue to escalate until there’s only One Left Standing. There may be weapons, or monsters, or just a streetway Dance Fight. It’s different every time. 1. 2. 3.

item.title: Last One Standing - (0/3 Signups)
item.dc:creator: Magnus
item.description:
This is very similar to the Death Game series, but different.

A situation will arise, and will continue to escalate until there’s only One Left Standing. There may be weapons, or monsters, or just a streetway Dance Fight. It’s different every time.
1.
2.
3.
